snippet.title: Bomberman (N-Gage) - Full Playthrough on Emulator
snippet.description:
Recently I learned of an emulator called EKA2L1. You can use this to emulate many things including N-Gage games. In the first minutes of this video I show you how to get it running because I had a hell of a time trying to get this thing going. Nice to finally have this emulated.


Something to note: each boss has a secret way of getting a bonus item. The method is different for each boss and can explain why I acted funny around each of them. It just gives you a large item but it's still kinda cool. Gives an audible jingle when you do it correctly.



Download: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1XGnly836bdXEZbdVaRhXTvUbXf4rI4D0?usp=sharing


EKA2L1 home page: https://github.com/EKA2L1/EKA2L1


Other Cracked N-Gage Games if you wanna try 'em: https://archive.org/download/ngagecrackedgamescollection


0:00 How To Run
1:48 Standard World
8:51 Forest World
15:01 Ice World
20:34 Volcano World
30:53 Underground Canal World
38:22 Desert World
44:18 Factory World
50:12 Highway World
1:01:42 Final Boss
1:03:30 Ending
